      • renderSnake

        private void renderSnake()
        Renders the snake and food. Draws a background.

      • updateHeatMap

        private void updateHeatMap()
        Adds the current location of the snake to the heatmap representation.

      • renderGameNotActive

        private void renderGameNotActive()
        Creates the death / pause game. Shows option to reset and unpause if game was paused, but only the reset option if snake has died. Does not draw background.

      • renderHeatMap

        private void renderHeatMap()
        Renders the heatmap using the colors from HeatMatColorUtils. Draws a background.

      • renderDeadSnakes

        private void renderDeadSnakes(boolean onlyMostRecent)
        Renders the dead snake PShapes. If onlyMostRecent is true it will only render the more recent snake to have died. If false it will render all dead snakes. Renders nothing if no snakes have died yet. Does not draw background.
        Parameters:
        onlyMostRecent - true to draw one, false to draw all

      • createSnakePShape

        private void createSnakePShape()
        Creates and stores a PShape for a snake in the deadSnakesShapes list. PShape is greated as a group with each cell of the snake being its own square PShape.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class processing.core.PApplet

      • mousePressed

        public void mousePressed()
        Overrides:
        mousePressed in class processing.core.PApplet

      • checkGameKeys

        private void checkGameKeys(char key)
        Changes state based off the input key. Actions are as follows:
        Actions by key
        Key action
        r or R resets the snake. Game stays active
        p or P flips state of game pause
        h or H toggle showing of heatmap
        j or J toggle showing of dead snakes
        g or G switch to displaying GUI start
        any sends key to snake's move
        Parameters:
        key - the character to be processed
